Hi All,
     I am using JUnit for regression testing. One of my test case m=
ethods executes same testconditions with a list of input data. When one of =
my test case condition fails, JUnit reports failure and aborts from further=
 executing the other test data.

	While it reports the failure, I would lov=
e it to execute the other tests also in the test method and report their re=
sults. Is there a way to make JUnit it to report alone and ignore the failu=
res to continue testing.

       Please find the sample code.

   public vo=
id testMyStuff(){
	String expectedResult[] =3D getExpectedResult();
	String=
 actualResult[] =3D getActualResult();
	for(int i=3D0;i<expectedResult.leng=
th;i++){
		assertEquals("Case failed"+i,expectedResult[i],actualResult[i] )=
;
	}
   }


	Any help is greatly appreciated.

Thanks,
Raj
